question_text:
Question 18
Which of the following additive manufacturing technique(
s
) can use a wire as a
 
feedstock material?
(A) Stereolithography 
 
(B) Fused deposition modeling
(C) Selective laser sintering 
(D) Directed energy deposition processes

GATE 2022 
 [Forenoon Session]
Mechanical Engineering
PAGE
19
explanation_text:
Sol. 
Wire is used as feed stock material in two manufacturing technique which are :

 
Fused deposition modelling

 
Directed energy deposition processes.
Hence, the correct option is (B,D).
